name: Adventure Map Spells
description:
This mod adds 24 adventure map spells.
  • Air
    • Accuracy
    • Clarity
    • Darkness
    • Divine Spirit
    • Fleet Foot
    • Power of Haste
  • Earth
    • Dead Luck
    • Death Call
    • Dwarven Luck
    • Herald of Death
    • Hold Ground
    • Power of Stone
  • Fire
    • Demonic Power
    • Rise Demons
    • Shattering Strike
  • Water
    • Benediction
    • Channel Power
    • Seafaring
    • Whirlpool Protection
  • Global
    • Arcane Protection
    • Empathy
    • Griffin Eye
    • Magic Cushion
    • Negotiations
author: Heroes III Modding Community, Aphra

1.5: Folders and files' names all camelCased
1.2: Fleet Foot gives bonus movement until next battle, and doesn't stack
1.1: Renamed mod to Adventure Map Spells
1.0: Spell balance and redesign by Aphra
